longInfo:
Admission and Transit Restrictions:
- Admission and transit refused to nationals of Israel
vaccination:
Vaccinations not required. 

Recommended:
- Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk exists throughout the year
  but transmission only occurs in rural areas of some
  districts, with a varying degree of risk. However, most
  parts of the country, including Dhaka City, have no risk of
  malaria. Recommended prevention in risk areas: C.
